entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -33.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
